resources.string: A small, rocky planet blanketed in a thick layer of yellowish clouds.
Earth is a small, rocky planet which supports a variety of life.
Mars is a small, rocky planet which is cold and lifeless.
Jupiter is a giant gas planet which is made up of about 90% hydrogen and 10% helium.
Saturn is a giant gas planet which is made up of about 75% hydrogen and 25% helium.
Uranus is a giant gas planet which is made up of mostly rock and various ices. Also has the worst name.
Neptune is a giant gas planet which is most likely made up of various “ices” and rock.
